upgrade.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by 12% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of 150 ATK will be gained based on 2.4% of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.1: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by 15% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of 187.5 ATK will be gained based on 3% of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.2: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by 18% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of 225 ATK will be gained based on 3.6% of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.3: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by 21% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of 262.5 ATK will be gained based on 4.2% of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.4: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by 24% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of 300 ATK will be gained based on 4.8% of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.

upgrade.0: 施放元素战技时，攻击力提升12%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，基于清除值的2.4%提升至多150点攻击力，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。
upgrade.1: 施放元素战技时，攻击力提升15%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，基于清除值的3%提升至多187.5点攻击力，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。
upgrade.2: 施放元素战技时，攻击力提升18%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，基于清除值的3.6%提升至多225点攻击力，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。
upgrade.3: 施放元素战技时，攻击力提升21%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，基于清除值的4.2%提升至多262.5点攻击力，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。
upgrade.4: 施放元素战技时，攻击力提升24%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限25%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，基于清除值的4.8%提升至多300点攻击力，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。

upgrade.0: 元素スキルを発動する時、攻撃力+12%、継続時間15秒。さらに、HP上限の25%を基に命の契約を付与、この効果は10秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。命の契約がクリアされた時、クリア時の数値の2.4%を基に攻撃力最大+150、継続時間15秒。命の契約：その値の分だけキャラクターが受ける治療を吸収し、同等の回復量を吸収した後にクリアされる。
